title: Risk assessment of driver performance in the oil and gas transportation industry: Analyzing the relationship between driver vigilance, attention, reaction time, and safe driving practices
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Al-Baraa Abdulrahman Al-Mekhlafi, Ahmad Shahrul Nizam Isha, Nicholas Chileshe, Ahmed Farouk Kineber, Muhammad Ajmal, Abdullah O. Baarimah, Al-Hussein M.H. Al-Aidrous
